body.name: Stroller Fan Portable Stroller Tripod Clip on Fan with 3 Speeds USB Battery Powered Mini Handheld Fan for Travel Personal Fan Cooling Fan for Home,Outdoors,Haze Black
body.stockDetail: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 17 mins
features: 【Stroller Fan with 3-Speeds Wind】: One-button operation for switching 3 wind speeds, breeze, normal, strong. Switch the speed to adjust to the indoors home, office, kitchen, and outdoors travel, shopping.

【USB Battery Handheld Fan】: The rechargeable handheld fan is powered by USB using a Type-C interface. You can charge the fan everywhere by power bank, laptop, car charger, computer, etc. The battery has 3000mAh, charges fast and last for 4-10 hours working time varies by the different speeds.
【Flexible Tripod Mini Fan】: The flexible tripod fan has a silicone tripod combined with high-quality bendable metal and soft silicone, it can be bent 360° to hang on everywhere.

【Cooling Fan Indoors & Outdoors】: When you switch to the first speed for clip on fan, you can nearly not hear the sound but feel the cool, will not disturb you when you're working or outdoor reading under the sun. There will be a slight wind in the second speed, like an autumn wind blowing. The strong wind in third speed will have a strong wind but definitely not a noise.
【Before & After Shopping Customer Service】: Lifetime after-sale services provide for you, please feel free to contact us anytime if you have any questions about stroller fans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value. More powerful than others I have used, but also larger, louder, and slower to charge.
reviews.reviewText: This is nice if you want a small rechargeable fan with high output. I would say the airflow is a bit more than a car vent on high. It charges only at 0.75 Amps @ 5 Volts, so it's slower to recharge. Fan says it is rated at 4 Watts. Low speed is 1.9 Watts, Medium is 3.2 or over (max charging circuit output), high is I would guess 5 Watts. Mounting solution works OK.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong little fan
reviews.reviewText: I use this for at my case at work. It’s easy to attach with the little bendable arms. Seems to have a good battery life. U only use it for about an hour or 2 each day. It’s been 2 days and I haven’t had to charge it yet.For being small it puts out a nice little breeze and the price is fair on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little fan to have! The 3 speeds make it nice to adjust how much it blows and the clip really lets you attach it to almost anything. It's also charged by USB-C which is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't Work With a Tray
reviews.reviewText: This stroller fan had promise, but fell short in application. If your stroller has food tray, there isn't a way to secure or attach the fan from the front. You can wrap the feet against the stroller frame, but then it sits right up against your child's face. The arms are not very strong or the fan is too heavy - it will lean over. Do appreciate the three fan speeds - it does a good job moving air and the protective design keeps baby from reaching in and cutting their hands. Like that the arm joins are very malleable, would be better if they were longer. Fan does charge quickly and last for awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rechargeable fan with 3 modes
reviews.reviewText: Fan can be used as a tripod fan or by itself.3 modes slow, medium, fast allows you to adjust the speed you need.Flexible without losing shape so perfect for car seats and strollers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These little fans are so great for literally everything. They hold a charge, and mostly get used during the hot summer days either on the wagon or the stroller. This one is small but mighty. The charge is great, and I can go a while without charging it. Small, compact and efficient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can attach to a stroller or just sit on your table
reviews.reviewText: This fan is great. It can easily attach to a stroller or it can just be placed on a table. It is small and compact so it doesn't take up a lot of space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for baby or adults!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This rechargeable detexis portable tripod fan is perfect to use on a stroller. It has 3 tall adjustable legs that allow you to twist the legs around handles and rails and other hard surfaces to keep the fan at a safe distance from the baby or toddler. This is super easy to operate and has 3 speeds (low, medium and high). You simply charge this ahead of use (it arrives already charged) and it will operate for approximately 4-10 hours before needing to be recharged - depending on the speed you use. It comes with a charging cord, but not the charging cube that the cord must be plugged into for charging. This is great to use for babies and toddlers, but can also be used for adults too (e.g., desk fan or a bedside fan). See my video and pictures for details. Thank you for reading my honest and objective review.
